description.value:
At 9th level, you can transform into a cloud of ectoplasm. Treat this as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}, except that you can fly at a speed of 30 feet, and you can solidify your form sufficiently to carry small objects, though fine manipulation is impossible. You can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level.

These minutes need not be consecutive, but must be used in 1-minute increments.
